title: IMMZD18SPolioIPVOnly ValueSet for Decision Table Schema
description: JSON Schema for IMMZD18SPolioIPVOnly ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#First IPV dose from the primary series was administered-92
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Second IPV dose from the primary series was administered-92
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Third IPV dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-107
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Third IPV dose from the primary series was administered and the client's age was 6 weeks when the primary series was started-235
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Booster IPV dose was administered. Polio immunization schedule has been completed-112
narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD18SPolioIPVOnly ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD18SPolioIPVOnlyVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
